channel.title: Help coding? :(
channel.description: i don't know if this is in right section, but maybe someone can give me a tut, on how to code something. i started my server today and i want to change what the npc say, so i go in there and change it.. then i save it then i go and compile it, and it says i have 9 errors. and when i log into my server the npc say what they used too. how can i fix it :(

yes, and i found it, but then when i change it, and go too compile i get all these errors. hmm.
